short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See if recipients have opened your email

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stealth byte is a simple and effective Chrome extension that lets you know when your emails have been opened by the recipients. Seamlessly integrating with Gmail, it adds a small, invisible tracking pixel to your outgoing emails. When the email is opened, you receive a notification, allowing you to track email engagement and follow up more effectively.

	This extension enhances your communication by providing insights into when your emails are read, helping you manage your outreach and improve response rates. Itâ€™s ideal for professionals who need to ensure their messages are received and opened, such as salespeople, recruiters, and anyone who relies on timely email communication.
